page.title: 17HEALTH CARE.
page.content: {Dr. Hoskyns}is a General practicioner.His surgery is in Great Oakley.He dispenses medicine to his patients because it is over one mile to the nearest chemist. Some people go to Dovercourt health centre.The specialist will come from Colchester to see people who are badly ill. The health visitor is Mrs.Booth she goes to see mothers, babies and children under school age. Some babies are born at Harwich but mothers are sent to Colchester if there are problems. Dr. Lovely and nurse Brooke come to school every term to give medicals to new pupils and leavers. They do check ups on hearing,eyesight etc.People needing spectacles or dental care must go to Harwich,Clacton,Colchester etc.
